name: Green-Bean Bake a la Campbell's
keywords: canned french fried onion, cream of mushroom soup, frozen green beans, milk, fall, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 can (10 ounces) Campbell's condensed cream of mushroom soup
Freshly ground black pepper to taste
2 9-ounce packages frozen french-cut green beans, defrosted, cooked and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. In a casserole, mix the soup, milk, soy sauce and pepper until smooth. Stir in the beans and half the onions. Bake uncovered for 25 minutes. Stir. Top with the remaining onions. Bake 5 to 10 minutes more, until the onions are golden brown.
